name: Flappy Hunt Free Game
description:
This Game Is Soooo Awesome You should DOWNLOAD IT NOW!!!

Seriously you have seen nothing like this forget all this other boring clone games. This is a pure genius of original game. But the birds are annoying and attacking you to the point of you losing your sanity. In order to protect your sanity you need to shoot them all. Please concentrate and shoot precisely. No bird should escape through your aim. Even if one bird passes through it's all over you lose and can end up with a lot of bird droppings in your yard. Anyway lets' download this game and get to shooting these birds. See you on the shooting range!

- Realistic sniper like target making you more likely to hit All Birds
- Share your score with friends on game center world wide
- Buy more lives to keep going even if you miss one of these annoying birds
- Awesome gun sound keeping you excited in the hunt wand making you crave more blood
- Shoot until your fingers hurt endless crazy shooting fun
